name: Yuka
0:
”Alexa, ask yuka to start working”
”Alexa, ask yuka to pause”
”Alexa, ask yuka to stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yuka
des:
The Yuka skill streamlines your lawn mowing experience, eliminating the need for manual control through any terminal. To use it, start by downloading and installing the Mammotion app, ensuring that you link your device to it and keep it online. Afterward, enable the skill.
Please note that before commencing a job, you must create at least one task in advance. Here are some voice command examples that allow you to start working, pause, stop, return to the charging dock, and check the status:

WORKING:
- Alexa, ask yuka to start working
- Alexa, ask yuka to start task one

PAUSE:
- Alexa, ask yuka to pause
- Alexa, ask yuka to hold on
- Alexa, ask yuka to suspend

CONTINUE:
- Alexa, ask yuka to continue 
- Alexa, ask yuka to resume

STOP:
- Alexa, ask yuka to stop working
- Alexa, ask yuka end the task

RETURN:
- Alexa, ask yuka to recharge
- Alexa, ask yuka go home

STATUS:
- Alexa, ask yuka status
- Alexa, ask yuka what it is doing
